summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY regarding juror questionnaire assignments for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. A paralegal specialist reassigns questionnaires for review ahead of voir dire proceedings scheduled for the next day.

persons.name: Sine
persons.context: Mentioned as not being in court the next day, leading to reassignment of their juror questionnaire review tasks.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the trial 'US_v._Maxwell' referenced in the email attachment filename, indicating this correspondence pertains to her criminal proceedings.

connections.description: Sine is part of the legal team or court staff involved in the jury selection process for Maxwell's trial.

events.title: Jury selection voir dire proceedings
events.description: Planned court proceedings for jury selection in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, involving review of juror questionnaires.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY, 1 Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The email is dated November 17, 2021, regarding juror questionnaires for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
It references an attachment titled 'US_v._Maxwell_Jurors_Proceeding_to_Voir_Dire' indicating active jury selection.
The correspondence shows internal coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY for trial preparation.
